thread.title: BRIEF-Caterpillar Says World Machines Retail Sales Up 34 Pct For 3-Month Ended Jan. 2018

title: BRIEF-Caterpillar Says World Machines Retail Sales Up 34 Pct For 3-Month Ended Jan. 2018
text: 18 PM / in 11 minutes BRIEF-Caterpillar Says World Machines Retail Sales Up 34 Pct For 3-Month Ended Jan. 2018 Reuters Staff Feb 13 (Reuters) - Caterpillar Inc: * CATERPILLAR - WORLD MACHINES RETAIL SALES FOR 3-MONTH ROLLING PERIOD ENDED JAN 2018 UP 34 PERCENT * CATERPILLAR - LATIN AMERICA MACHINES RETAIL SALES FOR 3-MONTH ROLLING PERIOD ENDED JAN. 2018 UP 49 PERCENT * CATERPILLAR - ASIA/PACIFIC MACHINES RETAIL SALES FOR 3-MONTH ROLLING PERIOD ENDED JAN. 2018 UP 51 PERCENT * CATERPILLAR - NORTH AMERICA MACHINES RETAIL SALES FOR 3-MONTH ROLLING PERIOD ENDED JAN. 2018 UP 23 PERCENT Source text ( bit.ly/2ElAbna ) Further company coverage:
